attributes.action: Change The Current Methods The UK Government Uses To Generate Income!
attributes.additional_details:
When the UK Government doesn't have limited finances, then it's capabilities will be much more better. The UK Government should be allowed to receive GRANTS from its Central Bank so it can improve Our Living Standards.

Https://helptheworld.live and the YouTube video on the blog explains lot's more. It explains, how to easily increase minimum wage, pensions, improve Public Services like the NHS and protect our Planet better. Also there are suggestions on how to easily overcome new obstacles.
attributes.background: Due to only being capable of using the current methods e.g. taxation, borrowing and profits from public sectors the UK Government's finances are limited. This limitation means that the UK Government encounters major problems when it comes to improving Public Services & Our Living Standards.

rejection.details: We're not sure exactly how you'd like the Government or Parliament to change the financial system. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
